articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/david.bisson
articles.title: Bitcoin Stealer Malware Takes $60K Using Clipboard Modification Method
articles.description: New malware steals bitcoin using a technique that modifies an infected machine’s clipboard content. In July 2018, Fortiguard Labs reported on a new malicious campaign, Bitcoin Stealer, which is currently responsible for taking approximately $60,000 in bitcoin.
